New Records: Lionel Messi broke the record for most minutes played in the tournament's history
Key Match Events: Lisandro Martínez scored the opening goal for Argentina in the 35th minute
Kevin Rodríguez scored the equalizing goal for Ecuador in the 90'+1'
Argentina won the match 4-2 on penalties
Emiliano Martínez made two key saves in the penalty shootout
Pre-Game Insights: Lionel Messi started the game despite being an injury doubt after missing their final group match against Peru because of a hamstring issue
Argentina coach Lionel Scaloni said that Messi finished the game well and felt well in the last five or six minutes
Post-Match Reflections: Argentina coach Lionel Scaloni said that he didn't enjoy the victory and that winning in penalties is not enjoyable
Ecuador coach Felix Sanchez said that Enner Valencia's penalty miss was a lottery and that maybe next time it will go in
Miscellaneous Highlights: Ecuador created the first chance when Jeremy Sarmiento found space to shoot from a tight angle and forced Martinez into a save
Argentina defender Cristian Romero blocked a shot from the rebound after Enner Valencia's penalty effort came off the post
